dialogs.user: I want to build an AI chat app
dialogs.assistant: Great! What type of AI chat do you want: personal assistant, coding assistant, therapy chat, or fun chatbot?
follow_up: Do you want dark mode only or both light & dark?

dialogs.assistant: Nice! What shop type: clothes, electronics, grocery, cosmetics, or mixed products?
follow_up: Do you want login via Google only?
Should sellers upload products or only admin?

dialogs.assistant: Sure. What type: expense tracker, EMI calculator, saving goals, wallet app, or UPI-style payments?
follow_up: Do you want login or no-login app?
Do you want ads or premium model?

dialogs.user: I want an app like Spotify
dialogs.assistant: Great! Do you want streaming from server, offline downloads, or only playlists?
follow_up: Should users earn money per stream?

dialogs.user: I want a simple game app
dialogs.assistant: Which type: puzzle, runner, quiz, tapping game, or card game?
Nice! What type: notes app, quiz app, learning videos, coding learning, or assignment helper?
Sure! What focus: workouts, yoga, diet planner, calorie tracker, or steps counter?

dialogs.user: I want an app like Instagram
dialogs.assistant: Nice choice! Should it allow posts, reels, stories, or all three?
Do you want simple editing, templates, music sync, or AI auto-editing?
follow_up: Do you want export in multiple ratios?
Should there be transitions and effects?

dialogs.assistant: Okay! What function: staff attendance, customer tracking, orders, billing, or inventory?
follow_up: Do you want login with Google?

dialogs.assistant: Great! What sections: about, skills, projects, contact, resume download?
follow_up: Should it be one-page or multi-page?

dialogs.assistant: Sure. Should news come from API, your database, or manually added?
Alright. Should users swipe like Tinder or browse profiles normally?
follow_up: Do users chat only after matching?

dialogs.user: I want an appointment booking app
dialogs.assistant: Good choice! What kind: doctor, salon, coach, tutor, or mechanic?

dialogs.user: I want to build an app for local services
dialogs.assistant: What service: home cleaning, electrician, plumber, carpenter, or mixed?
Which tool: scanner, calculator, notes, QR generator, or translator?
